content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":255232,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにーーー、迷惑なんてとんでもない、大歓迎だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What—? Trouble? Absolutely not, you're more than welcome."},{"lineNumber":255233,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺がずーーーっと抱いてやる、えーい、はやまりおって","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll hold you forever—hey, don't rush me."},{"lineNumber":255234,"originalJapaneseLine":"離れ宮島だな。シィル、追いかけるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the detached Miyajima Island. Seere, let's chase after it."},{"lineNumber":255235,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図、離れ宮島の位置を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"The map shows the location of the detached Miyajima Island."},{"lineNumber":255236,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし移動開始だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's start moving."},{"lineNumber":255237,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして光の道の前にきた","translatedEnglishLine":"And now we've arrived in front of the Path of Light."},{"lineNumber":255238,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここが月に一度だけ開く離れ宮島へ通じる道か、いくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is the path that opens only once a month to the detached Miyajima Island. Let's go."},{"lineNumber":255239,"originalJapaneseLine":"離れ宮島の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the detached Miyajima Island."},{"lineNumber":255240,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルか、クルックーか、ミラクルか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seere, Kurukku, or Miracle...?"},{"lineNumber":255241,"originalJapaneseLine":"設定","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting."},{"lineNumber":255242,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t離れ宮島","translatedEnglishLine":"\tDetached Miyajima Island."},{"lineNumber":255243,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t月に一日だけ\"光の道\"が繋がる","translatedEnglishLine":"\tThe 'Path of Light' connects only one day a month."},{"lineNumber":255244,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tレベル神に関する施設が並んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"\tFacilities related to the Level Gods are lined up here."},{"lineNumber":255245,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・レベル神教会総本山","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- The Head Church of the Level God."},{"lineNumber":255246,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・レベル神試験会場","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- Level God Examination Venue."},{"lineNumber":255247,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・レベル屋","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- Level Shop."},{"lineNumber":255248,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・レベル神予備校","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- Level God Preparatory School."},{"lineNumber":255249,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・レベルアップ祈願のＡＬ教支部","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- AL Sect Branch for Level-Up Prayers."},{"lineNumber":255250,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・おみやげ屋","translatedEnglishLine":"\t- Souvenir Shop."},{"lineNumber":255251,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tレベル神を目指す人達がここに集まります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\tPeople aiming to become Level Gods gather here."},{"lineNumber":255252,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t試験を受けたり修行したり","translatedEnglishLine":"\tThey take exams and train here."},{"lineNumber":255253,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tまた、無料のレベル屋もあるので全国から","translatedEnglishLine":"\tAlso, since there are free Level Shops, people come from all over the country."},{"lineNumber":255254,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t観光的な意味合いでも人が集まってきています。","translatedEnglishLine":"\tPeople also come here for tourism purposes."},{"lineNumber":255255,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t噂では","translatedEnglishLine":"\tRumor has it,"},{"lineNumber":255256,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t一時的にレベル限界を上げる絵馬とかが高額で売られているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"\tThere are high-priced votive plaques that temporarily raise level caps,"},{"lineNumber":255257,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t経験値無しでレベルアップしてくれる闇レベル屋があるとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"\tand black market Level Shops that level up without experience points."},{"lineNumber":255258,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t※ここで設定の全てを説明する必要は無い、到着後に分けてもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"\t*It's not necessary to explain every setting here; it can be divided after arrival."},{"lineNumber":255259,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスさんは、その逆でレベルダウンをしてもらう為にいったのと思います。","translatedEnglishLine":"I think Melface went there to get a level down instead."},{"lineNumber":255260,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの呪いは２ヶ月に一度、自分よりレベルが高い男性に抱かれないといけない","translatedEnglishLine":"That curse requires her to be embraced by a man higher level than herself once every two months."},{"lineNumber":255261,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスさんは高レベルになりすぎてその相手があまりおりませんが","translatedEnglishLine":"Melface has become so high level that there aren't many such partners."},{"lineNumber":255262,"originalJapaneseLine":"レベルが低くなれば、比較的自由に選べるようになるかと","translatedEnglishLine":"If her level decreases, she should be able to choose more freely."},{"lineNumber":255263,"originalJapaneseLine":"がーー、駄目だ、俺様以外は無理となっている方が望ましい。","translatedEnglishLine":"But—no, it would be best if only I am acceptable."},{"lineNumber":255264,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスさんも自分の好きな方との方が","translatedEnglishLine":"Melface would also be better off with someone she likes,"},{"lineNumber":255265,"originalJapaneseLine":"あほか、俺の事を好きに違い無い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Idiot, she must like me."},{"lineNumber":255266,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、チャカの野郎、自分が服に替えられてセックス出来ないからといって","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, that Chaka bastard, just because he was turned into clothes and can't have sex,"},{"lineNumber":255267,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様に嫉妬してそういういやがらせをしたのだな、ゆるさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"he's jealous of me and did that kind of harassment—unforgivable."},{"lineNumber":255268,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルの話","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel's story."},{"lineNumber":255269,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのメルフェイスさんの呪い、きっと私なら解除出来るわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sure I can break Melface's curse."},{"lineNumber":255270,"originalJapaneseLine":"しなくて良い","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to."},{"lineNumber":255271,"originalJapaneseLine":"それカラーの使う呪いの一種だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a type of curse used by Khala."},{"lineNumber":255272,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、付与したパワーは本来、彼女が持っていた物に違い無い","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the power granted must originally have belonged to her."},{"lineNumber":255273,"originalJapaneseLine":"呪いは対価でなく意味のない物","translatedEnglishLine":"A curse is not a price, but something meaningless."},{"lineNumber":255274,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、メルフェイスとチャカ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Melface and Chaka"},{"lineNumber":255275,"originalJapaneseLine":"宮島に到着していた","translatedEnglishLine":"had arrived at Miyajima Island."},{"lineNumber":255276,"originalJapaneseLine":"この機会だ、聞いておきたい","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the opportunity—I want to ask."},{"lineNumber":255277,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカが聞く、お前に呪いをかけたのはリクチェルではないのかと","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka asks if Rikucheru was the one who cursed you."},{"lineNumber":255278,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ・・はい、確かに","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh... yes, that's correct."},{"lineNumber":255279,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t過去話","translatedEnglishLine":"\tBackstory."},{"lineNumber":255280,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t先生だった、山賊にレイプされた","translatedEnglishLine":"\tShe was a teacher, raped by bandits."},{"lineNumber":255281,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tそこに魔女リクチェルが現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"\tThen the witch Rikucheru appeared."},{"lineNumber":255282,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t呪いを受けたがその力で山賊を撃退した","translatedEnglishLine":"\tShe received the curse but used its power to drive off the bandits."},{"lineNumber":255283,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tしばらくは呪いの力に耐えた、だが高レベルの相手はいなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"\tShe endured the curse's power for a while, but there was no high-level partner."},{"lineNumber":255284,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t当時私は、いじめられていた少女を守っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\tAt that time, I was protecting a bullied girl."},{"lineNumber":255285,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t少女は一人のやさしい少年により救われそうになっていたが","translatedEnglishLine":"\tThe girl was about to be saved by a kind boy,"},{"lineNumber":255286,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t私は・・あろうことか、その少年に手を出してしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"\tbut I—unbelievably—made a move on that boy."},{"lineNumber":255287,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tそれからはもうずるずると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"\tFrom then on, it spiraled downward..."},{"lineNumber":255288,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t軍にお世話になり、あなたに出会った。","translatedEnglishLine":"\tI was taken in by the military and met you."},{"lineNumber":255289,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t（この辺りは設定を元に作り上げて）","translatedEnglishLine":"\t(Develop this area based on settings.)"},{"lineNumber":255290,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t（ミニＣＧ　小学校時代２　を流用してもよい、また必要なら新規も可）","translatedEnglishLine":"\t(You may reuse Mini CG Elementary School Era 2, or create new ones if necessary.)"},{"lineNumber":255291,"originalJapaneseLine":"光の道を通り抜けてランス達は宮島に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Passing through the Path of Light, Rance and the others arrived at Miyajima Island."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにーーー、迷惑なんてとんでもない、大歓迎だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—? Trouble? Absolutely not, you're more than welcome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がずーーーっと抱いてやる、えーい、はやまりおって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll hold you forever—hey, don't rush me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島だな。シィル、追いかけるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the detached Miyajima Island. Seere, let's chase after it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図、離れ宮島の位置を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The map shows the location of the detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし移動開始だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's start moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして光の道の前にきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now we've arrived in front of the Path of Light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが月に一度だけ開く離れ宮島へ通じる道か、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the path that opens only once a month to the detached Miyajima Island. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルか、クルックーか、ミラクルか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere, Kurukku, or Miracle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に一日だけ"光の道"が繋がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 'Path of Light' connects only one day a month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神に関する施設が並んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facilities related to the Level Gods are lined up here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神教会総本山
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The Head Church of the Level God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神試験会場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level God Examination Venue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level Shop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神予備校
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level God Preparatory School.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベルアップ祈願のＡＬ教支部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - AL Sect Branch for Level-Up Prayers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・おみやげ屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Souvenir Shop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神を目指す人達がここに集まります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People aiming to become Level Gods gather here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試験を受けたり修行したり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take exams and train here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、無料のレベル屋もあるので全国から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, since there are free Level Shops, people come from all over the country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観光的な意味合いでも人が集まってきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People also come here for tourism purposes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 噂では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumor has it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時的にレベル限界を上げる絵馬とかが高額で売られているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are high-priced votive plaques that temporarily raise level caps,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験値無しでレベルアップしてくれる闇レベル屋があるとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and black market Level Shops that level up without experience points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここで設定の全てを説明する必要は無い、到着後に分けてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *It's not necessary to explain every setting here; it can be divided after arrival.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんは、その逆でレベルダウンをしてもらう為にいったのと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Melface went there to get a level down instead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの呪いは２ヶ月に一度、自分よりレベルが高い男性に抱かれないといけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That curse requires her to be embraced by a man higher level than herself once every two months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんは高レベルになりすぎてその相手があまりおりませんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface has become so high level that there aren't many such partners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルが低くなれば、比較的自由に選べるようになるかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If her level decreases, she should be able to choose more freely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がーー、駄目だ、俺様以外は無理となっている方が望ましい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But—no, it would be best if only I am acceptable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんも自分の好きな方との方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface would also be better off with someone she likes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、俺の事を好きに違い無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot, she must like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、チャカの野郎、自分が服に替えられてセックス出来ないからといって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, that Chaka bastard, just because he was turned into clothes and can't have sex,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に嫉妬してそういういやがらせをしたのだな、ゆるさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's jealous of me and did that kind of harassment—unforgivable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel's story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのメルフェイスさんの呪い、きっと私なら解除出来るわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure I can break Melface's curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しなくて良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それカラーの使う呪いの一種だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a type of curse used by Khala.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、付与したパワーは本来、彼女が持っていた物に違い無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the power granted must originally have belonged to her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いは対価でなく意味のない物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A curse is not a price, but something meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メルフェイスとチャカ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Melface and Chaka

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宮島に到着していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had arrived at Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この機会だ、聞いておきたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the opportunity—I want to ask.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカが聞く、お前に呪いをかけたのはリクチェルではないのかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka asks if Rikucheru was the one who cursed you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・はい、確かに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... yes, that's correct.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Backstory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先生だった、山賊にレイプされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was a teacher, raped by bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに魔女リクチェルが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the witch Rikucheru appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いを受けたがその力で山賊を撃退した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She received the curse but used its power to drive off the bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくは呪いの力に耐えた、だが高レベルの相手はいなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She endured the curse's power for a while, but there was no high-level partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時私は、いじめられていた少女を守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, I was protecting a bullied girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女は一人のやさしい少年により救われそうになっていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl was about to be saved by a kind boy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は・・あろうことか、その少年に手を出してしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I—unbelievably—made a move on that boy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからはもうずるずると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, it spiraled downward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍にお世話になり、あなたに出会った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was taken in by the military and met you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この辺りは設定を元に作り上げて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Develop this area based on settings.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ミニＣＧ　小学校時代２　を流用してもよい、また必要なら新規も可）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (You may reuse Mini CG Elementary School Era 2, or create new ones if necessary.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光の道を通り抜けてランス達は宮島に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passing through the Path of Light, Rance and the others arrived at Miyajima Island.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

necessary.)"},{"lineNumber":255291,"originalJapaneseLine":"光の道を通り抜けてランス達は宮島に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Passing through the Path of Light, Rance and the others arrived at Miyajima Island."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにーーー、迷惑なんてとんでもない、大歓迎だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—? Trouble? Absolutely not, you're more than welcome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺がずーーーっと抱いてやる、えーい、はやまりおって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll hold you forever—hey, don't rush me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島だな。シィル、追いかけるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the detached Miyajima Island. Seere, let's chase after it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図、離れ宮島の位置を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The map shows the location of the detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし移動開始だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's start moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして光の道の前にきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now we've arrived in front of the Path of Light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが月に一度だけ開く離れ宮島へ通じる道か、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the path that opens only once a month to the detached Miyajima Island. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルか、クルックーか、ミラクルか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere, Kurukku, or Miracle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れ宮島
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Detached Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に一日だけ"光の道"が繋がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 'Path of Light' connects only one day a month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神に関する施設が並んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facilities related to the Level Gods are lined up here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神教会総本山
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The Head Church of the Level God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神試験会場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level God Examination Venue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level Shop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベル神予備校
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Level God Preparatory School.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・レベルアップ祈願のＡＬ教支部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - AL Sect Branch for Level-Up Prayers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・おみやげ屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Souvenir Shop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神を目指す人達がここに集まります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People aiming to become Level Gods gather here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試験を受けたり修行したり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take exams and train here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、無料のレベル屋もあるので全国から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, since there are free Level Shops, people come from all over the country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観光的な意味合いでも人が集まってきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People also come here for tourism purposes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 噂では
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumor has it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時的にレベル限界を上げる絵馬とかが高額で売られているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are high-priced votive plaques that temporarily raise level caps,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験値無しでレベルアップしてくれる闇レベル屋があるとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and black market Level Shops that level up without experience points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここで設定の全てを説明する必要は無い、到着後に分けてもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *It's not necessary to explain every setting here; it can be divided after arrival.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんは、その逆でレベルダウンをしてもらう為にいったのと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Melface went there to get a level down instead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの呪いは２ヶ月に一度、自分よりレベルが高い男性に抱かれないといけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That curse requires her to be embraced by a man higher level than herself once every two months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんは高レベルになりすぎてその相手があまりおりませんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface has become so high level that there aren't many such partners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルが低くなれば、比較的自由に選べるようになるかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If her level decreases, she should be able to choose more freely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がーー、駄目だ、俺様以外は無理となっている方が望ましい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But—no, it would be best if only I am acceptable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスさんも自分の好きな方との方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface would also be better off with someone she likes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、俺の事を好きに違い無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot, she must like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、チャカの野郎、自分が服に替えられてセックス出来ないからといって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, that Chaka bastard, just because he was turned into clothes and can't have sex,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に嫉妬してそういういやがらせをしたのだな、ゆるさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's jealous of me and did that kind of harassment—unforgivable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel's story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのメルフェイスさんの呪い、きっと私なら解除出来るわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure I can break Melface's curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しなくて良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それカラーの使う呪いの一種だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a type of curse used by Khala.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、付与したパワーは本来、彼女が持っていた物に違い無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the power granted must originally have belonged to her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いは対価でなく意味のない物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A curse is not a price, but something meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メルフェイスとチャカ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Melface and Chaka

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宮島に到着していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had arrived at Miyajima Island.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この機会だ、聞いておきたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the opportunity—I want to ask.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカが聞く、お前に呪いをかけたのはリクチェルではないのかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka asks if Rikucheru was the one who cursed you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・はい、確かに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... yes, that's correct.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Backstory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先生だった、山賊にレイプされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was a teacher, raped by bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに魔女リクチェルが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the witch Rikucheru appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いを受けたがその力で山賊を撃退した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She received the curse but used its power to drive off the bandits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくは呪いの力に耐えた、だが高レベルの相手はいなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She endured the curse's power for a while, but there was no high-level partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時私は、いじめられていた少女を守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, I was protecting a bullied girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女は一人のやさしい少年により救われそうになっていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl was about to be saved by a kind boy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は・・あろうことか、その少年に手を出してしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I—unbelievably—made a move on that boy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからはもうずるずると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, it spiraled downward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍にお世話になり、あなたに出会った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was taken in by the military and met you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この辺りは設定を元に作り上げて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Develop this area based on settings.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ミニＣＧ　小学校時代２　を流用してもよい、また必要なら新規も可）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (You may reuse Mini CG Elementary School Era 2, or create new ones if necessary.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光の道を通り抜けてランス達は宮島に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passing through the Path of Light, Rance and the others arrived at Miyajima Island.
